ComicInfo.Title: Life's a Beach and Then You Die
ComicInfo.Writer: Eric A. Anderson,Eric Anderson,Manny Trembley,Eric Anderson,Manny Trembley
ComicInfo.Summary: Life's a Beach and Then You Die: After the death of his beloved and a long and violent quest for vengeance, Sam decides to vacation at the beach. His fun in the sun is interrupted when he is attacked by ninjas. Getting a helping hand from new pal Grog, Sam beats off the bad guys and tracks the source of their attack to an old mill where he is confronted by a jungle girl riding a rhino.
